Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized that India's familiarity with conditions in New York does not count as an advantage over Pakistan.
The pitch curator is confused about how the track will play, and Rohit Sharma joked that the players are equally confused.
Rohit Sharma stated that experience counts in difficult conditions, and the team is mentally tough to thrive in such situations.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma mentioned that the team has three right-handers in the top four, so it is nice to get a southpaw in Rishabh Pant at the number three spot.
Rohit Sharma said that the batting order is flexible, and none of the other positions are fixed.
Others: Rohit Sharma spoke about the low scores in matches played in New York, including India's first match against Ireland when the latter was bowled out for a sub-100 total.
